content: वर्धमान {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [वृध् --शानच्] Growing, increasing. --नः {@--1@} The castor-oil plant. {@--2@} A kind of riddle. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of a district (said to be the same as the modern Bardvāna). {@--5@} Sweet citron. --नः, --नं {@--1@} A pot or dish of a particular shape, lid. {@--2@} A kind of mystical diagram. {@--3@} A palace or temple built in the form of the above diagram. {@--4@} A house having no door on the south side. --ना <ab>N.</ab> of a district (the modern Bardvāna).
